data.name: Data Visualization Dashboard
data.description: For users who want to visualize and study trends on data with tools

accomplishments: Developed a web application for users who want to visualize and study trends on the data they upload or retrieve.
Allows users to login, save personal settings, and retrieve 3 data sets from a MySQL database.
Features a variety of tools, including table, bar, line, pie charts, and an interactive map that highlights states in color.
